Items.Description:
A tradable voucher that can be redeemed for a Bear Bee Egg! Only 1 Bear Bee Egg can be received per account.
Bear Bee Periodically transforms you into a Bear, granting x2 Pollen!

A tradable voucher that can be redeemed for a Cub Buddy, if you don't already have one. (Max 1 Cub Buddy per account)
A baby bear that follows you around collecting Tokens and granting Gifts!

A tradable voucher that can be redeemed once per account to permanently grant x2 Bee Gather Pollen!
Bees collect twice as much pollen when collecting from flowers!

A tradable voucher that can be redeemed once per account to permanently grant x2 Convert Speed!
Bees convert Pollen into Honey in half the time!
Can be redeemed for 100 Tickets.Only one may be redeemed per day.(This is a tradable voucher.)

Hatches into a special bee!
(64.9% Rare, 30% Epic, 5% Legendary, 0.1% Mythic)

Always hatches into an Epic, Legendary, or Mythic bee!
(79% Epic, 20% Legendary, 1% Mythic)

Always hatches into a Legendary or Mythic bee!
(95% Legendary, 5% Mythic)
Always hatches into a Gifted bee you don't already own! (Excludes Event bees. Limit 5 per player.)
Always hatches into a random Mythic bee! (Limit 3 per player.)
Transforms a bee's type (70% Rare, 27% Epic and 3% Legendary).
A value pack of Royal Jellies (33% Discount).
Used to activate and purchase various things in the game.
A value pack of tickets! (x2.5 Value. 4 Per Ticket.)
A value pack of tickets! (x3 Value. 3.33 Per Ticket.)
A value pack of tickets! (x4 Value. 2.5 Per Ticket.)
Activate to plant a random Sprout in a field. Collect pollen to make it grow.
A value pack of 10 Magic Beans!
Grows in around 3 hours playtime. Grants Nectar, Stickers (at least 5), and more. Always spawns a Rare Puffshroom (or better)! (Requires 20 Bees to purchase. Limit 10 per player.)
Summons Night time. A Moon Sprout and a Vicious Bee are guaranteed to appear.

Items.Name: Honey Pouch
Items.Description: Instantly gain 10,000 Honey.

Items.Name: Honey Sack
Items.Description: Instantly gain 250,000 Honey.

Items.Name: Honey Chest
Items.Description: Instantly gain 1,000,000 Honey.

Items.Name: Honey Vault
Items.Description: Instantly gain 5,000,000 Honey.

Gives permanent access to Bear Bee. It periodically transforms you into a bear, granting x2 pollen, increased movement speed, and higher jump power!
(This part is not included in the description.) (This is the 2nd Edition Bear Bee version. The 1st Edition version was available during the first month of the game's release for 650 robux. For those that bought it during that time, it will become gifted and will also have a 1st Edition Flag on it.)
Allows your bees to convert pollen at the hive into honey twice as fast.
Allows your bees to collect twice as much pollen at a time when gathering from flowers.
Doubled your chance of receiving a ticket when defeating mobs and collecting pollen.

A Discounted Pack of 700 Tickets.
Periodically transforms you into a bear, granting x2 pollen!
Activate to plant a Festive Sprout in a field. Grants Tickets, rare ingredients, and powerful boosts! Limit 5.
1st Edition Festive Bee Egg, 30 Red Extracts, 30 Oils, 30 Magic Beans, 1M honey.

Summons Tornadoes to Collect Pollen and Tokens!
Blows Rain Clouds around the map to help others!
(Permanently obtainable for free as a rare prize from the Wind Shrine. Shop offer ends Oct 27.)

1 Diamond Egg, 100 Tickets, 25 Magic Beans, 25 Jelly Beans, 10 Field Dice, 5 Cloud Vials, 150k Honey
(Limit 1. Offer ends Oct 27.)

1 Star Jelly, 250 Tickets, 1000 Gumdrops, 100 Coconuts, 100 Stingers, 50 Oils, 500k Honey
(Limit 1. Offer ends Oct 27.)
1 Star Treat, 100 Glitters, 100 Tropical Drinks, 100 Glues, 50 Jelly Beans, 10 Cloud Vials, 2.5M Honey

Introducing the Mythic Bees!
Tadpole, Vector, and Spicy Bee!
Each possesses powerful and unique abilities!
Pack contains: 1 Mythic Egg, 250 Tickets, 25 Red Extracts, 25 Blue Extracts. (Contains 1 Mythic Egg, which always hatches into a random Mythic Bee. Offer ends Feb 9th.)

Cub Buddy follows you collecting tokens and occasionally granting random gifts!
Collect skins to customize your Cub Buddy!
Pack Contains: 1 Cub Buddy, 1 Noob Cub Skin (Limited Ed.),
500 Tickets and Noob Cub Skin (If player purchased pack after completing Bee Bear's tenth quest)
(Cub Buddy is obtainable in game for free. Noob Cub Skin is a limited  exclusive. Offer ends Feb 9th.)
1 Diamond Egg, 100 Tickets, 10 Box-O-Frogs, 500 Gumdrops, 25 Jelly Beans, 25 Coconuts, 5 Magic Beans, 150k Honey (Limit 1. Offer ends Feb 9.)
1 Star Egg, 100 Stingers, 25 Glitters, 5 Night Bells, 100 Moon Charms, 25 Jelly Beans, 500k Honey (Limit 1. Offer ends Feb 9.)
5 Atomic Treats, 500 Tickets, 25 Neonberries, 250 Bitterberries, 100 Glues, 100 Enzymes, 50 Tropical Drinks, 2.5m Honey (Limit 1. Offer ends Feb 9.)

Meet Fuzzy, the new Mythic Bee!
Pollinates flowers, upgrading them to the next level!
Pack Contains: 1 Fuzzy Bee Egg, 250 Tickets, 10 Glitters  and 10 Glues 
(Limit 1 pack per player. Offer ends May 17.)
1 Mythic Egg, 750 Tickets, 10 Super Smoothies, 25 Glitters, 25 Magic Beans, 25 Enzymes, 2.5m Honey (Limit 1. Offer ends July 5.)
1 Mythic Egg, 1 Diamond Egg, 1 Gold Egg, 10 Jelly Beans (Limit 1. Offer ends December 13.)

Puppy Bee and exclusive Reindeer Antlers Beequip!
Enhances Puppy Bee and adds a Festive Theming!
Pack Contains: Puppy Bee (500 tickets if the player already owns Puppy Bee), Reindeer Puppy Antlers (refund of cost in Bee Bear's Catalog if Reindeer Antlers are already owned), 50 Gingerbread Bears

Meet Buoyant Bee, the Blue Mythic Bee
Spawns Balloons to carry Pollen and inflate your bag!
Pack Contains: 1 Buoyant Bee Egg, 250 Tickets, 25 Glues, 25 Blue Extracts, 10 Purple Potions, and 3 Red, White, and Black Balloons (Limit 1 pack per player. Offer ends March 31.)

Meet Precise Bee, the Red Mythic Bee
Shoots lasers and unleashes Super-Critical power!
